title: Pinnacle Studio Ultimate 18.5.1 + Content + Bonus Content
description:
Take on any video-editing challenge with Pinnacle Studio 18 Ultimate, our most complete version. Powered by a new native 64-bit architecture, Ultimate lets you create breathtaking movies with support for 4K Ultra HD video. You get all the features of Pinnacle Studio Plus and more, including NewBlue bonus effects, Blu-ray authoring, iZotope Music & Speech Cleaner, additional Scorefitter soundtracks, and support for XAVC S for 4k and HD. Energize your videos with 2,000+ transitions, effects and templates, add the perfect soundtrack, and easily share online, on disc and on devices.

- New! 64-bit performance
- Enhanced! Live Screen Capture
- New! NewBlue effects pack
- New! 17 royalty-free tracks from Triple Scoop Music
- New! 4K Ultra HD including XAVC S support
- 2,000+ effects, transitions and templates
- Unlimited-track frame-accurate editing
- iZotope Music & Speech Cleaner

Features :

Powerful video editing
Drag and drop elements to make a movie automatically or use the Storyboard mode to plan. More experienced editors can use the timeline for precision editing.

Live Screen Capture
Record content from your screen and include the footage in movies with Live Screen Capture. Even add voiceover while you capture!

Video effects
Choose from over 2,000 2D and 3D effects to surprise and delight your audience.

Multi-layer editing
Combine an unlimited number of video and audio track for multi-layer editing, and create custom-fit soundtracks with Scorefitter.

Premium effects from NewBlue
Take your videos to the next level with over 700 presets and more than 55 plugins including:

- Motion Blends - Video transitions that twist, turn, zoom, smear and spin.
- Light Blends - Light-inspired scene transitions with light flairs, orbs, rays, strobes and more.
- Film Effects - Create an authentic, old school film look with blemishes, jitters, spots, scratches and graininess.
- Stabilizer - Stabilize shakey video to easily create steady footage.
- Video Essentials 2 - Create a vignette, swap specific colors in a scene, add picture-in-picture, and correct lens distortion.
- Video Essentials 6 - Remove subtle imperfections, replicate footage into a video wall, magnify a video segment for emphasis.
- Video Essentials 7 - Avoid tedious keyframing when applying pixelation, easily pan and zoom on still or video, and more.

4K Ultra HD Video support
If you're shooting video in 4K Ultra HD, Pinnacle's got you covered with 4K Ultra HD Video support that includes new XAVC S support and 4K smart encoding.

Remove unwanted noise & enhance audio
iZotope Music & Speech Cleaner easily removes unwanted noise from your audio and video files. Experience increased audio clarity and enhanced sound!

Video sharing & Blu-ray Disc authoring
Post your movies online with one-click sharing toYouTube and Vimeo. Create DVDs and Blu-rayÃ¢â€žÂ¢ discs, and export your movies to popular formats to play them on game consoles and mobile devices.

System Requirements :

- Internet connection required for enabling Blu-ray functionality, online activation and cloud or online services
- Windows 8, Windows 7 (64-bit OS recommended)
- Intel Core Duo 1.8 GHz, Core i3 or AMD Athlon 64 X2 3800+ 2.0 GHz or higher
- Intel Core2 Duo 2.66 GHz, Intel Core i5 or i7 1.06 GHz or higher required for AVCHD* & Intel Quick Sync Video support
- 2 GB of RAM or higher, min. 4 GB for Windows 64-bit
- DirectX 9 (or higher) graphics device with Pixel Shader 3.0 support like:
- NVIDIA GeForce 6 series or higher (CUDA enabled required for CUDA support)
- ATI X1000 series or higher
- Intel GMA X3000 series or higher
- 128 MB VGA VRAM; 256 MB or higher recommended, required for AVCHD, stereoscopic 3D & CUDA
- Display resolution: 1024 x 600 or higher
- Windows-compatible sound card (multi-channel output required for surround preview)
- 5.8 GB HDD space for full installation
- DVD-ROM for installation (box version only)

Accessories:
- DVD burner for creating DVD and AVCHD discs
- Blu-ray burner for creating Blu-ray discs

Stereoscopic 3D Accessories:
- Anaglyph 3D display: red/cyan glasses required
- 3D TV and compatible glasses with NVIDIA 3DTV Play software on supported GeForce or Quadro graphics card.
- NVIDIA 3D Vision Ready display notebook: Compatible GeForce or Quadro graphics card, 3D Vision Ready display or projector and 3D Vision/3D Vision Pro glasses and emitter.

Input Options:
- Capture from DV, HDV and Digital8 camcorders or VCRs (requires a FireWire port)
- Capture from analog camcorders, 8 mm, HI 8, VHS, SVHS, VHS-C, SVHS-C, or VCRs (NTSC/PAL/ SECAM) (requires Pinnacle or Dazzle video hardware Ã¢â‚¬â€œ sold separately)
- Import from AVCHD and other file based camcorders, digital still cameras, mobile devices and webcams

Import Formats:
- Video: MVC, AVCHD, DV, HDV, AVI, MPEG-1/-2/-4, DivX, Flash, 3GP (MPEG-4, H.263), WMV, Non-encrypted DVD titles (incl. DVD-VR/+VR), QuickTime (DV, MJPEG, MPEG-4, H.264), DivX Plus MKV
- Audio: MP3, MPA, M4A, WAV, AMR, AC3, AAC, Vorbis, WMA
- Graphic: JPS, BMP, GIF, JPG, PCX, PSD, TGA, TIF, WMF, PNG, J2K

Export Formats:
- AVCHD, XAVC S, BD Blu-ray, DVD (DVD-R, DVD-RW, DVD+R or DVD+RW, dual layer); 3D: DVD, AVCHD, AVCHD2 (incl. MVC), Blu-ray
- Apple iPod/iPhone/iPad/TV, Sony PSP/PS3, Nintendo Wii, Microsoft Xbox compatible formats
- DV, HDV, AVI, DivX, WMV, MPEG-1/-2/-4, Flash, 3GP, WAV, MP2, MP3, MP4, QuickTime, H.264, DivX Plus MKV, JPEG, TIF, TGA, BMP; 3D: MVC, AVCHD, MPEG-4, DivX Plus, MJPEG
- Dolby Digital 2-channel and 5.1-channel audio

Supported Languages:
- Pinnacle Studio 18: Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Polish, Russian, Spanish, and Swedish.
- Live Screen Capture: Dutch, English, French, German, Italian, and Japanese
- iZotope Music & Speach Cleaner: English, German, Italian and Japanese

What's New :

- Pinnacle MyDVD included for simple and powerful disc burning
- Added Favorites option in each Content category
- To help further improve the stability of the product, implemented a crash logging capability as part of the new User Experience Improvement Program.
- Resolved bugs related to disc burning
- Improved Smart Encoding handling of multiple files and titles
- Several fixes and improvements related to Effects, Keyframes, and File format support
- Addresses several issues with Pinnacle MyDVD

Notes :

Install the software with the serial number from the keygen. During installation, click "Activate and register later" and then click "Register later".

Install the update
